login.introText: To continue, please login with one of the providers below

setup.introText: To login to Geona and use the administration tools you first need to configure an OAuth provider. Please complete the form below with the required details:
setup.forbidden: OAuth provider details have already been set in config_server.json. Please contact the server administrator to make changes
setup.googleIntro: For information on how to obtain OAuth credentials from Google please read Using OAuth 2.0 to Access Google APIs. During this process you will be asked for two key pieces of information these are:
setup.GutHubIntro: To add GitHub OAuth please visit the Register a new OAuth application page on the GiHub website
setup.administratorsExplanation: Please enter the email address of administrators. You must enter at least one addresss that is registered with the OAuth provider(s) that you select; multiple addresses should be separated with a comma

messages.administrators: Enter at least one administrator email address; multiple addresses should be comma separated
messages.provider: Please select at least one OAuth provider and complete the details for the selected provider(s)
messages.google_clientId: The Client ID for Google OAuth is required
messages.google_secret: The Secret for Google OAuth is required
messages.github_clientId: The Client ID for GitHub OAuth is required
messages.github_secret: The Secret for GitHub OAuth is required
